Configure PostgREST request
Define Statements (CREATE TABLE, ...)
func:
const dataspace = env.get('FIWARE_SERVICE');

msg.payload = []
msg.payload[0] = `
CREATE TABLE ${dataspace}_bikehiredockingstations (
    time timestamptz NOT NULL,
    "stationCode" text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    "alternateName" text NOT NULL,
    "availableBikeNumber" integer NOT NULL,
    location geometry NOT NULL,
    "freeSlotNumber" integer NOT NULL,
    "observationDateTime" timestamptz NOT NULL
)
`;

msg.payload[1] = `SELECT create_hypertable('${dataspace}_bikehiredockingstations', 'time')`;
msg.payload[2] = `COMMENT ON TABLE ${dataspace}_bikehiredockingstations IS 'Column types follow the smart data model Transportation.BikeHireDockingStation: https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/tree/master/BikeHireDockingStation'`

return msg;

name: Define Statements (CREATE TABLE, ...)
func:
const dataspace = env.get('FIWARE_SERVICE');

msg.payload = []
msg.payload[0] = `
CREATE TABLE ${dataspace}_evchargingstations (
    time timestamptz NOT NULL,
    id text NOT NULL,
    address jsonb NOT NULL,
    "dataProvider" text NOT NULL,
    location geometry NOT NULL,
    operator text NOT NULL,
    "observationDateTime" timestamptz NOT NULL,
    "socketNumber" int NOT NULL,
    "socketType" jsonb NOT NULL,
    "powerConsumption" double precision NOT NULL
)
`;

msg.payload[1] = `SELECT create_hypertable('${dataspace}_evchargingstations', 'time')`;
msg.payload[2] = `COMMENT ON TABLE ${dataspace}_evchargingstations IS 'Column types follow the smart data model Transportation.EVChargingStation: https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/tree/master/EVChargingStation'`
return msg;
